stsjorbsmod:Abjure.NAME: Abjure
stsjorbsmod:Abjure.DESCRIPTION: Put Spirit Shield into your hand from your draw pile, discard pile or exhaust pile.
stsjorbsmod:Abjure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put Spirit Shield into your hand from your draw pile, discard pile or exhaust pile.

stsjorbsmod:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
stsjorbsmod:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Draws 1 additional card for each Accumulation in your discard pile.

stsjorbsmod:Aid.NAME: Aid
stsjorbsmod:Aid.DESCRIPTION: Heal an enemy for !M! HP. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Aid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal an enemy for !M! HP. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Amnesia.NAME: Amnesia
stsjorbsmod:Amnesia.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 random buff.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Did I leave the oven on?

stsjorbsmod:AnimateObjects.NAME: Animate Objects
stsjorbsmod:AnimateObjects.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Gain Thorns equal to the number of non-exhausted cards that didn't start the combat in your deck.

stsjorbsmod:Anxiety.NAME: Anxiety
stsjorbsmod:Anxiety.DESCRIPTION: Draw !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! cards and gain [E]. NL Permanently lower the number of cards drawn by !M!. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Apparate.NAME: Apparate
stsjorbsmod:Apparate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Vulnerable. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:Apparition_Cull.NAME: Apparition
stsjorbsmod:Apparition_Cull.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:ArcaneForm.NAME: Arcane Form
stsjorbsmod:ArcaneForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of stsjorbsmod:Patience, stsjorbsmod:Lust, stsjorbsmod:Kindness, and stsjorbsmod:Chastity.
stsjorbsmod:ArcaneForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of stsjorbsmod:Patience, stsjorbsmod:Lust, stsjorbsmod:Kindness, and stsjorbsmod:Chastity.

stsjorbsmod:ArcaneWeapon.NAME: Arcane Weapon
stsjorbsmod:ArcaneWeapon.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, deal !D! stsjorbsmod:Attack Damage to a random enemy.

stsjorbsmod:Assertion.NAME: Assertion
stsjorbsmod:Assertion.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! times the number of skills played this act, up to !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! damage.

stsjorbsmod:Banish.NAME: Banish
stsjorbsmod:Banish.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes no action and no damage for !M! turns. Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:BlackTentacles.NAME: Black Tentacles
stsjorbsmod:BlackTentacles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This turn, all damage you deal to other enemies is dealt to this enemy instead.

stsjorbsmod:BlackTentacles_Cull.NAME: Black Tentacles
stsjorbsmod:BlackTentacles_Cull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This turn, all damage you deal to other enemies is dealt to this enemy instead.

stsjorbsmod:Blasphemer.NAME: Blasphemer
stsjorbsmod:Blasphemer.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, add !M! *Smites to your hand and Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:BookOfTongues.NAME: Book of Tongues
stsjorbsmod:BookOfTongues.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, put !M! stsjorbsmod:Material Component into your hand.
stsjorbsmod:BookOfTongues.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, put !M! stsjorbsmod:Material Component into your hand.

stsjorbsmod:Brambles.NAME: Brambles
stsjorbsmod:Brambles.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of stsjorbsmod:Material Components played this combat.
stsjorbsmod:Brambles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL !stsjorbsmod:BaseDamage! + the number of stsjorbsmod:Material Components played this combat.

stsjorbsmod:Brooding.NAME: Brooding
stsjorbsmod:Brooding.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a random curse to your discard pile.

stsjorbsmod:Catharsis.NAME: Catharsis
stsjorbsmod:Catharsis.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable Curse cards can now be played. NL Whenever you do, deal !M! damage to a random enemy for each Curse played this combat and lose 1 HP.

stsjorbsmod:ChainLightning.NAME: Chain Lightning
stsjorbsmod:ChainLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Chain to ALL enemies, gaining !M! damage per chain.

stsjorbsmod:Chamomile.NAME: Chamomile
stsjorbsmod:Chamomile.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Remove Frail and Weak from yourself.
stsjorbsmod:Chamomile.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Remove Frail, Vulnerable, and Weak from yourself.

stsjorbsmod:Channel.NAME: Channel
stsjorbsmod:Channel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! [E] next turn.
stsjorbsmod:Channel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! [E] next turn. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

stsjorbsmod:Channeling.NAME: Channeling
stsjorbsmod:Channeling.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile for each incoming attack. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Channeling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile for each incoming attack.

stsjorbsmod:ChatteringStrike.NAME: Chattering Strike
stsjorbsmod:ChatteringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play this card !M! additional time.
stsjorbsmod:ChatteringStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play this card !M! additional times.

stsjorbsmod:ChillTouch.NAME: Chill Touch
stsjorbsmod:ChillTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. NL It can no longer heal.

stsjorbsmod:Clarify.NAME: Clarify
stsjorbsmod:Clarify.DESCRIPTION: Retain: While this is in your hand, Retain !M! extra card. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert: Your draw pile is shown in order.
stsjorbsmod:Clarify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain: While this is in your hand, Retain !M! extra cards. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert: Your draw pile is shown in order.

stsjorbsmod:Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
stsjorbsmod:Cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Discard all Curses from your draw pile. NL Heal !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! HP for each Curse discarded. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Coda.NAME: Coda
stsjorbsmod:Coda.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this would kill an enemy, instead leave the enemy at 1 HP.

stsjorbsmod:ColorSpray.NAME: Color Spray
stsjorbsmod:ColorSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and apply a random debuff to each. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Envy.

stsjorbsmod:CorrodingBarrier.NAME: Corroding Barrier
stsjorbsmod:CorrodingBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Decrease this card's Block this combat by !M! each time it is drawn.

stsjorbsmod:Counterspell.NAME: Counterspell
stsjorbsmod:Counterspell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact if enemy intends to apply a negative effect. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:CULLCard.NAME: CULL
stsjorbsmod:CULLCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL stsjorbsmod:Wrath is applied twice. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Cyclone.NAME: Cyclone
stsjorbsmod:Cyclone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL Gain [E] for each enemy killed.

stsjorbsmod:Damnation.NAME: Damnation
stsjorbsmod:Damnation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Permanently Transform the next card played this combat.
stsjorbsmod:Damnation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Permanently Transform the next card played this combat, then upgrade it.

stsjorbsmod:DeathThroes.NAME: Death Throes
stsjorbsmod:DeathThroes.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Entombed. stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL stsjorbsmod:Exhume whenever an enemy dies. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Wrath.
stsjorbsmod:DeathThroes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Entombed. stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL stsjorbsmod:Exhume whenever an enemy dies. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of stsjorbsmod:Wrath.

stsjorbsmod:DemonicCoup.NAME: Demonic Coup
stsjorbsmod:DemonicCoup.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Gain !M! Ritual. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert.

stsjorbsmod:Determination.NAME: Determination
stsjorbsmod:Determination.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Pride. NL At the end of this turn, stsjorbsmod:Snap. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Discordance.NAME: Discordance
stsjorbsmod:Discordance.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of stsjorbsmod:Card Types in your hand times !M!.

stsjorbsmod:DisguiseSelf.NAME: Disguise Self
stsjorbsmod:DisguiseSelf.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.

stsjorbsmod:Double.NAME: Double
stsjorbsmod:Double.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next card that Exhausts is played twice.
stsjorbsmod:Double.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! cards that Exhaust are played twice.

stsjorbsmod:DoubleCheck.NAME: Double-check
stsjorbsmod:DoubleCheck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Diligence. NL At the start of your next turn, if you remember stsjorbsmod:Diligence gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:DrainLife.NAME: Drain Life
stsjorbsmod:DrainLife.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage. NL Gain Max HP equal to the damage dealt. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert.
stsjorbsmod:DrainLife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal X+1 damage. NL Gain Max HP equal to the damage dealt. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert.

stsjorbsmod:Ectoplasm_Cull.NAME: Ectoplasm
stsjorbsmod:Ectoplasm_Cull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! gold for each stsjorbsmod:Manifest. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Entangle.NAME: Entangle
stsjorbsmod:Entangle.DESCRIPTION: Apply stsjorbsmod:Slow to ALL enemies. NL Add !M! stsjorbsmod:Web into your hand.
stsjorbsmod:Entangle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply stsjorbsmod:Slow to ALL enemies. NL Add !M! stsjorbsmod:Webs into your hand.

stsjorbsmod:Equinox.NAME: Equinox
stsjorbsmod:Equinox.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the current Floor number. NL The cost of this card is equal to the current Act number. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Equinox.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the current Floor number. NL The cost of this card is equal to the current Act number - !M!. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Exhale.NAME: Exhale
stsjorbsmod:Exhale.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL At the start of your next turn, lose !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Strength.
stsjorbsmod:Exhale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL At the start of your next turn, lose !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Strength. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Expose.NAME: Expose
stsjorbsmod:Expose.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this does not end the combat, lose !M! HP.

stsjorbsmod:EyeOfTheStorm.NAME: Eye of the Storm
stsjorbsmod:EyeOfTheStorm.DESCRIPTION: Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory, then remember a random memory you do not have stsjorbsmod:Clarity of. NL Gain !B! Block.

stsjorbsmod:FalseBlessings.NAME: False Blessings
stsjorbsmod:FalseBlessings.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Exert: Fill your potion belt with random potions.

stsjorbsmod:FaerieFire.NAME: Faerie Fire
stsjorbsmod:FaerieFire.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Virtue: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL stsjorbsmod:Sin: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Fear.NAME: Fear
stsjorbsmod:Fear.DESCRIPTION: Target non-boss enemy will flee in !M! turns. If this ends combat, you gain no rewards but keep Clarities for the next combat.

stsjorbsmod:Feast.NAME: Feast
stsjorbsmod:Feast.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Gluttony. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Feint.NAME: Feint
stsjorbsmod:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! card.

stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliar.NAME: Find Familiar
stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory.
stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory.

stsjorbsmod:FindWeakness.NAME: Find Weakness
stsjorbsmod:FindWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M! the first time you attack an enemy each turn.

stsjorbsmod:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
stsjorbsmod:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Lust. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
stsjorbsmod:Fireball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Lust. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! stsjorbsmod:Burning to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:Firebolt.NAME: Firebolt
stsjorbsmod:Firebolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply stsjorbsmod:Burning equal to !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! times the number of stsjorbsmod:Clarities you have.

stsjorbsmod:FlameWard.NAME: Flame Ward
stsjorbsmod:FlameWard.DESCRIPTION: The next time you are attacked, apply !M! stsjorbsmod:Burning to ALL enemies and gain !B! Block. Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:FocusedRage.NAME: Focused Rage
stsjorbsmod:FocusedRage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Strength for each card stsjorbsmod:Exerted this combat. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert.

stsjorbsmod:ForbiddenGrimoire.NAME: The Grimoire
stsjorbsmod:ForbiddenGrimoire.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL stsjorbsmod:Entombed until you stsjorbsmod:Snap OR start turn 7. NL Choose 1 of 3 stsjorbsmod:Material Components. NL stsjorbsmod:Exhume after playing this then !M! other cards.

stsjorbsmod:ForcedPresence.NAME: Forced Presence
stsjorbsmod:ForcedPresence.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Intangible. If you do, gain !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! [E]. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:FracturedMind.NAME: Fractured Mind
stsjorbsmod:FracturedMind.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Sin: Deal !D! damage. NL stsjorbsmod:Virtue: Gain !B! Block. NL stsjorbsmod:Snapped: Do both.

stsjorbsmod:FranticMind.NAME: Frantic Mind
stsjorbsmod:FranticMind.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card for each stsjorbsmod:Manifest, then draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:FranticMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card for each stsjorbsmod:Manifest, then draw that many cards.

stsjorbsmod:FranticSearch.NAME: Frantic Search
stsjorbsmod:FranticSearch.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! stsjorbsmod:Material Component into your hand for each enemy. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:FranticSearch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put !M! stsjorbsmod:Material Component into your hand for each enemy. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:FreshAdventure.NAME: Fresh Adventure
stsjorbsmod:FreshAdventure.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Diligence. NL This card gains !M! damage permanently when you stsjorbsmod:Snap.

stsjorbsmod:Frostbite.NAME: Frostbite
stsjorbsmod:Frostbite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, stsjorbsmod:Consume this.

stsjorbsmod:Frustration.NAME: Frustration
stsjorbsmod:Frustration.DESCRIPTION: Retain: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:GatherPower.NAME: Gather Power
stsjorbsmod:GatherPower.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL This turn, your next attack is played !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! additional time.
stsjorbsmod:GatherPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL This turn, your next attack is played !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! additional times.

stsjorbsmod:GatheringEvil.NAME: Gathering Evil
stsjorbsmod:GatheringEvil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! Strength and !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Vulnerable for each Curse played this combat. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:GatheringEvil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! Strength and !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Vulnerable for each Curse played this combat. NL Exhaust. NL Exhume when you shuffle your draw pile.

stsjorbsmod:GrimDirge.NAME: Grim Dirge
stsjorbsmod:GrimDirge.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Entombed. NL stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL stsjorbsmod:Exhume on turn !M!. NL Deal !D! damage.

stsjorbsmod:Haunt.NAME: Haunt
stsjorbsmod:Haunt.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Gain !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Intangible. NL Draw !M! fewer card next turn.
stsjorbsmod:Haunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Intangible. NL Draw !M! fewer card next turn. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:HoldMonster.NAME: Hold Monster
stsjorbsmod:HoldMonster.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength until end of turn. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Hurt.NAME: Hurt
stsjorbsmod:Hurt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose HP equal to the number of stsjorbsmod:Clarities you have.

stsjorbsmod:Index.NAME: Index
stsjorbsmod:Index.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then put !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! cards from your hand on top of your draw pile in random order.
stsjorbsmod:Index.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then put !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

stsjorbsmod:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
stsjorbsmod:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Lust. NL Double target enemy's stsjorbsmod:Burning. NL Exhaust. stsjorbsmod:Exhume when you stsjorbsmod:Snap.
stsjorbsmod:Inferno.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Lust. NL Triple target enemy's stsjorbsmod:Burning. NL Exhaust. stsjorbsmod:Exhume when you stsjorbsmod:Snap.

stsjorbsmod:Intervention.NAME: Intervention
stsjorbsmod:Intervention.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Permanently add Procrastination to your deck. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert.

stsjorbsmod:Introspection.NAME: Introspection
stsjorbsmod:Introspection.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, lose !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! HP and deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. Deal !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! additional damage per stsjorbsmod:Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:Investment.NAME: Investment
stsjorbsmod:Investment.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Gain !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! gold. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert. NL When you draw this card, permanently increase its gold by !M!.

stsjorbsmod:IvoryTower.NAME: Ivory Tower
stsjorbsmod:IvoryTower.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust all Curse and Status cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:IvoryTower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust all Curse and Status cards in your hand.

stsjorbsmod:LocateObject.NAME: Locate Object
stsjorbsmod:LocateObject.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Greed. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:LoseGrip.NAME: Lose Grip
stsjorbsmod:LoseGrip.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. stsjorbsmod:Exhume when you stsjorbsmod:Snap.

stsjorbsmod:MageArmor.NAME: Mage Armor
stsjorbsmod:MageArmor.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL When you would lose HP, lose !M! fewer HP and discard this.

stsjorbsmod:MagicMirror.NAME: Magic Mirror
stsjorbsmod:MagicMirror.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy applies a debuff to you, apply that debuff to ALL enemies.
stsjorbsmod:MagicMirror.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever an enemy applies a debuff to you, apply that debuff to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:MagicMissiles.NAME: Magic Missiles
stsjorbsmod:MagicMissiles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !D! damage once per stsjorbsmod:Clarity you have.

stsjorbsmod:Mania.NAME: Mania
stsjorbsmod:Mania.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of unique cards in your hand. If they are all unique, gain !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! [E] and draw !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! card.
stsjorbsmod:Mania.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !stsjorbsmod:BaseDamage! + the number of unique cards in your hand. If they are all unique, gain !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! [E] and draw !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! card.

stsjorbsmod:Materialize.NAME: Materialize
stsjorbsmod:Materialize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose 1 of 3 stsjorbsmod:MaterialÂ Components.

stsjorbsmod:Melt.NAME: Melt
stsjorbsmod:Melt.DESCRIPTION: Apply stsjorbsmod:Burning equal to target's Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

stsjorbsmod:Mending.NAME: Mending
stsjorbsmod:Mending.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP equal to the number of stsjorbsmod:Clarities you have. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Mending.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal HP equal to twice the number of stsjorbsmod:Clarities you have. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Message.NAME: Message
stsjorbsmod:Message.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Message.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Mindworm.NAME: Mindworm
stsjorbsmod:Mindworm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage if stsjorbsmod:Snapped. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

stsjorbsmod:Miracle_Cull.NAME: Miracle
stsjorbsmod:Miracle_Cull.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! [E] . NL Add !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! stsjorbsmod:Manifest. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Mirror.NAME: Mirror
stsjorbsmod:Mirror.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Until your next turn, take no damage and reflect attack damage enemies deal to you.

stsjorbsmod:MirroredTechnique.NAME: Mirrored Technique
stsjorbsmod:MirroredTechnique.DESCRIPTION: This combat, play all attacks an additional time for each time you are being attacked. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert.
stsjorbsmod:MirroredTechnique.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This combat, play all attacks an additional time for each time you are being attacked + !M!. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert.

stsjorbsmod:MirrorImage.NAME: Mirror Image
stsjorbsmod:MirrorImage.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL Summon an Intangible Mirror Image with !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:MistyStep.NAME: Misty Step
stsjorbsmod:MistyStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! per stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL Draw !M! card.
stsjorbsmod:MistyStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! per stsjorbsmod:Clarity plus !stsjorbsmod:BaseBlock!. NL Draw !M! card.

stsjorbsmod:Moss.NAME: Moss
stsjorbsmod:Moss.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Dexterity until end of turn. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:OldBook.NAME: Old Book
stsjorbsmod:OldBook.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Entombed. NL stsjorbsmod:Exhume when you would die; instead stsjorbsmod:Destroy this card. NL Unplayable
stsjorbsmod:OldBook.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Entombed. NL stsjorbsmod:Exhume when you would die; instead stsjorbsmod:Destroy this card and heal !M! percent of your Max HP. NL Unplayable.

stsjorbsmod:OldPocket.NAME: Old Pocket
stsjorbsmod:OldPocket.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Charity. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:OldPocket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Charity. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Overkill.NAME: Overkill
stsjorbsmod:Overkill.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you kill an enemy, deal any overkill damage to ALL enemies.
stsjorbsmod:Overkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you kill an enemy, deal any overkill damage + !M! to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:Panic.NAME: Panic
stsjorbsmod:Panic.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Lose !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Max HP.

stsjorbsmod:Paralysis.NAME: Paralysis
stsjorbsmod:Paralysis.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:PartingBlow.NAME: Parting Blow
stsjorbsmod:PartingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL !M! minus your Max HP.

stsjorbsmod:ParryingBlow.NAME: Parrying Blow
stsjorbsmod:ParryingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Patience. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card.

stsjorbsmod:Pathos.NAME: Pathos
stsjorbsmod:Pathos.DESCRIPTION: Cards in your hand cost 0 this turn. NL Add a curse to your discard pile for each card played.

stsjorbsmod:Patron.NAME: Patron
stsjorbsmod:Patron.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL stsjorbsmod:Entombed until you stsjorbsmod:Snap. NL Deal !D! damage. NL stsjorbsmod:Destroy.
stsjorbsmod:Patron.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL stsjorbsmod:Entombed until you stsjorbsmod:Snap. NL Deal !D! damage. NL stsjorbsmod:Downgrade.

stsjorbsmod:Phantasm.NAME: Phantasm
stsjorbsmod:Phantasm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Intangible, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:Pollute.NAME: Pollute
stsjorbsmod:Pollute.DESCRIPTION: Turn all cards in your hand into Curses (they can still be played). NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Pollute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Turn all cards in your hand into Curses (they can still be played).

stsjorbsmod:PollutedStrike.NAME: Polluted Strike
stsjorbsmod:PollutedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! stsjorbsmod:Attack Damage once for each Curse in your hand.

stsjorbsmod:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
stsjorbsmod:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your stsjorbsmod:Coil. NL Gain !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! stsjorbsmod:Coil.

stsjorbsmod:Prestidigitation.NAME: Prestidigitation
stsjorbsmod:Prestidigitation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, apply !M! Weak or !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.

stsjorbsmod:Procrastination.NAME: Procrastination
stsjorbsmod:Procrastination.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Starts each combat in your discard pile.

stsjorbsmod:ProdigalMemory.NAME: Prodigal Memory
stsjorbsmod:ProdigalMemory.DESCRIPTION: Draw !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! cards and lose !M! max HP. NL If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, stsjorbsmod:Exert.

stsjorbsmod:PurgeMind.NAME: Purge Mind
stsjorbsmod:PurgeMind.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL cards which "remember". Then, deal !D! damage once per such card in your Exhaust pile. NL stsjorbsmod:Snap. Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Pyromancy.NAME: Pyromancy
stsjorbsmod:Pyromancy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you apply stsjorbsmod:Burning, apply that much stsjorbsmod:Burning again.
stsjorbsmod:Pyromancy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply stsjorbsmod:Burning, apply that much stsjorbsmod:Burning again.

stsjorbsmod:Quicksilver.NAME: Quicksilver
stsjorbsmod:Quicksilver.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Advance relics !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! turn through time. NL This turn, your next card is played !M! additional time.
stsjorbsmod:Quicksilver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Advance relics !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! turn through time. NL This turn, your next card is played !M! additional times.

stsjorbsmod:RayOfFrost.NAME: Ray of Frost
stsjorbsmod:RayOfFrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! times.

stsjorbsmod:ReapAndSow.NAME: Reap and Sow
stsjorbsmod:ReapAndSow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, deal the leftover damage to ALL enemies at the start of the next combat.

stsjorbsmod:Rebuke.NAME: Rebuke
stsjorbsmod:Rebuke.DESCRIPTION: Gain !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Intangible. NL Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to !D! times your Intangible. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Rebuttal.NAME: Rebuttal
stsjorbsmod:Rebuttal.DESCRIPTION: Retain: Gain !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Thorns while this is in your hand. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert: Gain !M! Thorns.

stsjorbsmod:Rediscovery.NAME: Rediscovery
stsjorbsmod:Rediscovery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of a new memory, gain 1 [E].
stsjorbsmod:Rediscovery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of a new memory, gain 1 [E].

stsjorbsmod:RefuseToForget.NAME: Refuse to Forget
stsjorbsmod:RefuseToForget.DESCRIPTION: You cannot forget your current memory until you have stsjorbsmod:Clarity of it. NL Draw !M! cards. NL You cannot draw more cards this turn.

stsjorbsmod:Rest.NAME: Rest
stsjorbsmod:Rest.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Chastity. NL Gain !B! Block. NL End your turn.

stsjorbsmod:Ritual.NAME: Ritual
stsjorbsmod:Ritual.DESCRIPTION: Gain !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Intangible. NL Retain up to !M! card until next turn. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Ritual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Intangible. NL Retain up to !M! cards until next turn. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Rot.NAME: Rot
stsjorbsmod:Rot.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Lose a random stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL When this is initially added to your hand, add !M! additional copy.
stsjorbsmod:Rot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Lose a random stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL When this is initially added to your hand, add !M! additional copies.

stsjorbsmod:Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
stsjorbsmod:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] when drawn. NL Ethereal. NL This turn, pay Max HP instead of [E]. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert.
stsjorbsmod:Sacrifice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] when drawn. NL Ethereal. NL This turn, pay Max HP instead of [E]. NL stsjorbsmod:Exert.

stsjorbsmod:SchoolsOfMagic.NAME: Schools of Magic
stsjorbsmod:SchoolsOfMagic.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If you have no duplicate cards in hand, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity; otherwise, Exhaust 1 of each duplicate.

stsjorbsmod:ScorchingRay.NAME: Scorching Ray
stsjorbsmod:ScorchingRay.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Lust. NL Apply !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! stsjorbsmod:Burning !M! times. This stsjorbsmod:Burning is affected by Strength.

stsjorbsmod:Sentinel_Cull.NAME: Sentinel
stsjorbsmod:Sentinel_Cull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lower your stsjorbsmod:Manifest by !M!. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Shake.NAME: Shake
stsjorbsmod:Shake.DESCRIPTION: If enemy is Vulnerable, draw !M! cards. NL Apply !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:ShrapnelBloom.NAME: Shrapnel Bloom
stsjorbsmod:ShrapnelBloom.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Exert. NL This turn, the next non-Legendary card you play is played !M! additional time, then stsjorbsmod:Exerts.
stsjorbsmod:ShrapnelBloom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Exert. NL This turn, the next non-Legendary card you play is played !M! additional times, then stsjorbsmod:Exerts.

stsjorbsmod:Siphon.NAME: Siphon
stsjorbsmod:Siphon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, heal !M! HP.

stsjorbsmod:SiphonEnergy.NAME: Siphon Energy
stsjorbsmod:SiphonEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Draw !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! cards. NL Gain [E] for each stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL (Gain !M! [E] ) NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:SnakeOil.NAME: Snake Oil
stsjorbsmod:SnakeOil.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Patience. NL Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the amount of stsjorbsmod:Coil you have. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:SnakeOil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Patience. NL  Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to twice the amount of stsjorbsmod:Coil you have. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:SpiritShield_Cull.NAME: Spirit Shield
stsjorbsmod:SpiritShield_Cull.DESCRIPTION: Reduce all damage taken by !M! until next turn.

stsjorbsmod:Stalwart.NAME: Stalwart
stsjorbsmod:Stalwart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Temperance. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Steel.NAME: Steel
stsjorbsmod:Steel.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Upgrade !M! card in your hand until the end of combat.
stsjorbsmod:Steel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Upgrade !M! cards in your hand until the end of combat.

stsjorbsmod:Stone.NAME: Stone
stsjorbsmod:Stone.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply stsjorbsmod:Slow to enemy. NL If already stsjorbsmod:Slowed, double its stsjorbsmod:Slow stacks. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Stone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply stsjorbsmod:Slow to enemy. NL If already stsjorbsmod:Slowed, triple its stsjorbsmod:Slow stacks. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:StrangePendant.NAME: Strange Pendant
stsjorbsmod:StrangePendant.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the first damage taken each turn by !M!.

stsjorbsmod:Strife.NAME: Strife
stsjorbsmod:Strife.DESCRIPTION: Add !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! random Curse to your discard pile. NL Gain !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! Strength for each Curse in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Strife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! random Curses to your discard pile. NL Gain !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! Strength for each Curse in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Summoning.NAME: Summoning
stsjorbsmod:Summoning.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! card from your draw pile. stsjorbsmod:Exhume it at the start of of next turn.
stsjorbsmod:Summoning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! cards from your draw pile. stsjorbsmod:Exhume them at the start of of next turn.

stsjorbsmod:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
stsjorbsmod:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Intangible. NL Apply 3 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:ThirstingSword.NAME: Thirsting Sword
stsjorbsmod:ThirstingSword.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! stsjorbsmod:Burning and heal HP equal to target's stsjorbsmod:Burning. NL Lose !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! Max HP. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Thorns.NAME: Thorns
stsjorbsmod:Thorns.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Humility. NL If an enemy intends to attack, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Thorns.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Humility. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:TimeEddy.NAME: Time Eddy
stsjorbsmod:TimeEddy.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Advance ALL buffs and debuffs !M! turn through time.
stsjorbsmod:TimeEddy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Advance ALL buffs and debuffs !M! turns through time.

stsjorbsmod:TickingCurse.NAME: Ticking Curse
stsjorbsmod:TickingCurse.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. stsjorbsmod:Exert. NL When Exhausted, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:TinyHut.NAME: Tiny Hut
stsjorbsmod:TinyHut.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory.
stsjorbsmod:TinyHut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory.

stsjorbsmod:Toil.NAME: Toil
stsjorbsmod:Toil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, permanently upgrade a random card. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Toll.NAME: Toll
stsjorbsmod:Toll.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the sum of your relic counters.

stsjorbsmod:TollTheDead.NAME: Toll the Dead
stsjorbsmod:TollTheDead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target had already been damaged this turn, deal !D! damage again.

stsjorbsmod:Tragedy.NAME: Tragedy
stsjorbsmod:Tragedy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Curses. NL Deal !D! damage for each Curse exhausted. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Trauma.NAME: Trauma
stsjorbsmod:Trauma.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Snap. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

stsjorbsmod:Trouble.NAME: Trouble
stsjorbsmod:Trouble.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse, draw !M! card.
stsjorbsmod:Trouble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse, draw !M! cards.

stsjorbsmod:TrueStrike.NAME: True Strike
stsjorbsmod:TrueStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This damage cannot be prevented or reduced.

stsjorbsmod:UnseenServant.NAME: Unseen Servant
stsjorbsmod:UnseenServant.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Sloth. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:UnseenServant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Sloth. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Draw !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! card. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Wail.NAME: Wail
stsjorbsmod:Wail.DESCRIPTION: Apply !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! Vulnerable. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:WanderingMind.NAME: Wandering Mind
stsjorbsmod:WanderingMind.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Remember a random memory you do not have stsjorbsmod:Clarity of.

stsjorbsmod:WastingForm.NAME: Wasting Form
stsjorbsmod:WastingForm.DESCRIPTION: Add !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! random Curses to your discard pile. NL Whenever you draw a Curse, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:WastingStrike.NAME: Wasting Strike
stsjorbsmod:WastingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card in your exhaust pile.

stsjorbsmod:Web.NAME: Web
stsjorbsmod:Web.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:WeightOfMemory.NAME: Weight of Memory
stsjorbsmod:WeightOfMemory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL cards which "remember".

stsjorbsmod:Will.NAME: Will
stsjorbsmod:Will.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL stsjorbsmod:Entomb a random card in your hand until you snap; it costs 0 until played.
stsjorbsmod:Will.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL stsjorbsmod:Entomb a card in your hand until you snap; it costs 0 until played.

stsjorbsmod:Withdraw.NAME: Withdraw
stsjorbsmod:Withdraw.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Withering.NAME: Withering
stsjorbsmod:Withering.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Each time drawn, Intangible reduces damage by !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! less this combat.
